sourcesContent:
Usage Data

This component demonstrates fetching usage data from the server.

Col1
import { Component, Inject, Input } from '@angular/core'; import { UsageBySimDTO } from '../models/Usage'; @Component({ selector: 'app-usage-data', templateUrl: './usage-data.component.html' }) export class UsageDataComponent { @Input() usageBySim: UsageBySimDTO[] = []; }
